basics.name: Ricardo Figueroa Quiroga
basics.label: Java Developer
basics.summary: I was born in Tamaulipas Mexico, Currently work at Unosquare as a Senior Java Engineer, Before working at Unosquare I was a Senior Java Developer at EcareSoft. While my work focuses on the back end, I also have working experience on the front end using Angular, JQuery and vanilla javascript. While his work focuses on applied information theory, mostly optimizing lossless compression schema of both the length-limited and adaptive variants,

location.address: Privada Azucena #137, Foret Residencial, El Fortin

work.summary: At Unosquare I work as a Senior Java Engineer, I been involved in several projects ranging from legacy java applications to creating node js apps from scratch
highlights: Added support for a questions & answers section on an e-commerce site using a third party API
Added versioning support for one of the resources provided on the API allowing users to access different version dependig at what point in time the bought the item
Worked on several projects doing Tier 2 and Tier 3 support

work.summary: At Ecaresoft I worked as a Senior Java Developer on some of the product the company produces, ranging for a CRM/ERM, Payroll System and HIS software
highlights: Added support to allow each hospital to customized the content of sent and received HL7 messages
Designed, developed and implemented the functionality to reach Suresctipts certification for electronic prescribing
Developed the printing jobs for the checks generated by the payroll system of the Tamaulipas Department of Educations
